channel.title: The Kitchn on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in The Kitchn on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Roasted Broccoli & Cheddar Soup
item.description: Ingredients 2 tablespoons oil, divided 1 medium leek, white and light green parts thinly sliced 1 medium Yukon Gold potato 1 (16-ounce) bag frozen broccoli, or 1 large bunch broccoli (about 2 pounds), cut into small florets and stems discarded or saved for another use 6 cups low-sodium vegetable broth, low-sodium chicken broth, or water 1 cup shredded extra-sharp cheddar cheese (4 ounces) Salt Freshly ground black pepper Crème fraîche, plain yogurt, or lemon wedge, for serving Directions Arrange a rack in the middle of the oven and heat to 450°F.
